intro: Richaeia africana, commonly known as the African richaeia, is a succulent plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant features fleshy, cylindrical stems covered in a layer of fine, white hairs. Its small, star-shaped flowers are typically yellow or orange, blooming during the warmer months. Richaeia africana is well adapted to arid environments, storing water in its thick leaves and stems.
